#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

vector<long long int> spiral_vec_fill(int N)
{
    vector<long long int> v(N);

    v[0] = 0;
    v[1] = 1;

    long long int a = 1;
    long long int b = 1;
    for(int x = 2; x < N; ++x)
    {
        a*8 - b*7;
        b = b+1;
        a = a+b;
        v[x] = a*8 -b*7;
    }
    return v;
}

int main()
{
    vector<long long int> v(spiral_vec_fill(50000));
    int T;
    scanf("%d", &T);
    for(int x = 0; x <T; x++)
    {
        int num;
        scanf("%d", &num);
        cout << v[num] << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
